components.title: Meet the products chosen for you
components.content: To get the best out of your Skin + Me treatment, it’s all about keeping things simple. Discover our recommended routine – with what to use and when to use it, with the products our expert Dermatology Team recommend for you and your skin.

components.title: FAQs
components.content: Got questions before you start? We’re here with answers. Find out everything you need to know about our treatments, pricing, delivery, results, routines and more.

FAQList.faq1: How do I incorporate my Skin + Me into my skincare routine?
FAQList.faq2: My skin is getting worse, what should I do?
FAQList.faq3: How do I incorporate my Skin + Me into my skincare routine?
FAQList.faq4: How long will it take for me to see my results in the mirror?
FAQList.faq5: Can I use my own products whilst using Skin + Me?

components.title: New around here
components.content: Before you click your first dose from your Daily Doser, please read of our Patient Information Leaflet. It’s full of important information about using your Skin + Me personalised solution.
